description: This data product provides agricultural output, input and total factor productivity (TFP) growth rates, but not levels, across the countries and regions of the world in a consistent, comparable way, for 1961-2010.
title: International Agricultural Productivity

distribution.description:
Countries - Agricultural total factor productivity growth indices for countries, 1961-2013
Agricultural total factor productivity growth indices for geographic regions, 1961-2013
Agricultural total factor productivity growth indices for regions (countries grouped by income class), 1961-2013
distribution.title: Web page with link to Excel files

publisher.name: Economic Research Service, Department of Agriculture
